name: Far Star
description:
Far Star is a story-driven action-adventure game with Metroidvania influences. There is something fishy going on in this galaxy, but this won’t stop your intergalactic general services crew from doing their job using a varied set of skills, weapons and outfits.

Your job will take you to various interesting places in the galaxy.



With up to 4 members in your crew, you can swap them to choose the best one for the task in hand.



Customize your characters to your likeness.



Choose the best weapon for the job.



Complete some light puzzles and mini-games.



The galaxy needs you!
